ip.description: IPv4 or IPv6 to bind this port to

last_n.description: How many distinct socket addresses from recvfrom to remember and send (broadcast) packets to, including from this very port. Can be 0.

forget_ms.description: For how many milliseconds keep those `last_n` socket addresses around.

sendto.description: List of static socket addresses to send packets to.

multicast_addr.description: Join this IPv4 multicast group. Also requires `multicast_ifaddr` IP address. Does not automatically imply `sendto` membership.

multicast_ifaddr.description: IP address of network interface to join multicast group.

multicast_ttl.description: Override TTL for outgoing multicast datagrams, if the address is in `sendto`

multicast6_ifindex.description: Specify network interface index instead of default 0.
